metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5017 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in the C cli shell in Apache Zookeeper before 3.4.9 and3.5.x before 3.5.3, when using the "cmd:" batch mode syntax, allowsattackers to have unspecified impact via a long command string.

criterions.comment: zookeeper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
